text: Kan Mehtarzai railway station () is a disused railway station located in the Balochistan province of Pakistan. It is on Zhob Valley Railway, the former narrow-gauge line between Bostan and Zhob, 16 miles west of Muslim Bagh. At 2224 meters above sea level, it was the highest railway station in Pakistan until service was discontinued in 1986. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Killa Saifullah District Category:Railway stations on Zhob Valley Railway Line Category:Railway stations opened in 1921 Category:Railway stations closed in 1986
title: Kan Mehtarzai railway station
